title: Compound Investments
shortDescription: Put 50 COMP in a compound liquidity pool for 3 months and earn COMP rewards!
longDescription:
### Perform these steps to earn your reward!  
1. Click the Enroll button below.  
2. Navigate to [Compound's trading site.](https://app.compound.finance/)  
3. Do some other stuff.  
4. Come back here and click Verify.  
5. You should recieve your reward in 3 months!
